Articles.Content:
Here's an idea for a challenge. "Rescue" a kerbonaught by having them jetpack up to sub-orbital (on an airless body) and rendezvous with a ship.

Stock, no cheats (infinite fuel, etc).

Points:

Jet pack Fuel remaining x gravity of world (in m/s/s)

"I jumped so high Bonus" 2x for 100% jet pack fuel. (Gilly Jumping....)

I guess there would be no way of verifying that the Kerbonaught actually jumped unless you make a video, so this would be on the honor system.....

Edited March 30, 2015 by Rematog
This would be ridiculously easy on Gilly.

From a 100km orbit, around Gilly, I get out of the ship, "land" and return to the ship, using only 8% jet pack fuel (92% left).

EDIT: Forgot to mention, it's not really an entry for this challenge, but it's kinda related and I thought it would be interesting to show it to you. Edited March 30, 2015 by Aphobius

This would be ridiculously easy on Gilly.

True, Gilly may be easy, but with 0.049 m/s/s surface gravity, it gives few points. if you Jumped (100% fuel left, and got double points) you'd get 2 x 100% x .049 or 0.098 points. This would be about equal to Minmus with 20% fuel left or Mun with 6% fuel left.
